title: How can I smartcast 'X' for AA
body:
I have seen streamers AA without having the necessity to point on enemy champions and right-click. And I am assuming it is X since I do it sometimes to click on small Krugs.

But it is hard to use since it is not on a smartcast mode. 

How can I do that to easily move and AA with having tons of attack speed, and use it efficiently?

replies.body: Hmmmm I think you might be seeing people use the Attack-Move command. You should be able to hit "a" by default and left click in order to move towards that location while attacking anything in the way.
does that give priority to Champions if there are minions in the way?

Fairly sure attack-move will always just attack the nearest "enemy" target within your attack range while also inside your movement path.
So, no, won't prioritize.
EvilMerodach is correct here, attack-move will target minions first if there are any in the way.
